pageTitle: Bus Schedules and Routes on São Miguel Island | São Miguel Bus
bannerSubtitle: Find the best route for you.
noRoutesMessage: No routes found. Please try again with different parameters.
advertiseSubtitle: Advertise on our application from X euros per month.
whyAdsButton: Why are there ads in the app?
aboutAdsParagraph1: The São Miguel Bus application was developed by just one person, without any external support or association with companies or entities. Ads play a crucial role:
aboutAdsParagraph2: They help cover the costs of the application's server
aboutAdsParagraph3: They allow the application to remain completely free for all users
supportThankYou: We appreciate your understanding and support in using São Miguel Bus!
infoDevelopedBy: This application was developed by Sousa Dev
infoNotDevelopedByBusCompanies: Application Not Developed by Bus Companies
noRoutesSubtitle: Try changing your origin or destination, or select a different day.
